item.title: AMP: How to handle fixed header bars
item.description: The Problem Using fixed-positioned header bars (or top navigation bars) is way more complicated when using AMP than it should be. To grant an optimal user experience, you have to consider three possible contexts: AMP page AMP page with blocked JavaScript (no AMP runtime execution) AMP page in AMP Viewer (such as Google's) Usually, the first two contexts are not a big problem.
